page.title: 13Burton Regatta
page.content: Burton Regatta is not like most regattas because it is a one day event and most regattas are two day events.It has all different crews in it like novice crews,senior crews,veteran crews and elite. People come from all over England to compete in the rowing event held on the River Trent.There is a small fair and some stalls selling things like socks and clothes.The actual preparations for the regatta take place two weeks before the regatta takes place.The things are set out on the Saturday before the regatta. The regatta starts about nine a.m.and finishes about six p.m. There is a disco in the evening for the people who have competed in the regatta.There is also a gymnastics display and an acrobatic display.
